p: All of the analyzed samples have the same predominant crystalline CuFe 2O 4 phase found in the first batch, with smaller traces of CuO and Fe 2O 3. It is worth noticing that the characteristic peaks of these undesired phases have been considerably reduced and are difficult to be detected with this view. Again, to make a better comparison between the different synthesis conditions, some peaks are zoomed and shown in Figure 9 . The selected peaks are the same as those in Figure 1 .
